languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс вскидывает голову, встает и, поморщившись, пристально изучает оружие Зари.{/n} "Этот нечистый предмет — творение нечеловеческих рук. И, судя по холоду, что я ощущаю, оно же — орудие Архиврага... премного благодарен за вашу бдительность, {name}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс вскидывает голову, встает и, поморщившись, пристально изучает оружие Зари.{/n} "Этот нечистый предмет — творение нечеловеческих рук. И, судя по холоду, что я ощущаю, оно же — орудие Архиврага... премного благодарен за вашу бдительность, {name}".

languages.text: {n}Heinrix raises his head, gets up, and makes a wry face as he carefully examines Aurora's weapon.{/n} "This unholy object is the work of inhuman hands. And judging by the cold I am sensing, it is a tool of the Archenemy... I am most grateful for your vigilance, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс вскидывает голову, встает и, поморщившись, пристально изучает оружие Зари.{/n} "Этот нечистый предмет — творение нечеловеческих рук. И, судя по холоду, что я ощущаю, оно же — орудие Архиврага... премного благодарен за вашу бдительность, {name}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix raises his head, gets up, and makes a wry face as he carefully examines Aurora's weapon.{/n} "This unholy object is the work of human hands. And judging by the cold I am feeling, it is also a tool of the Archenemy... I am most grateful for your vigilance, {name}."

{n}Heinrix raises his head, gets up, and makes a wry face as he carefully examines Aurora's weapon.{/n} "This unholy object is the work of human hands. And judging by the cold I am feeling, it is also a tool of the Archenemy... I am most grateful for your vigilance, {name}."

{n}Heinrix raises his head, gets up, and makes a wry face as he carefully examines Aurora's weapon.{/n} "This unholy object is the work of human hands. And judging by the cold I am feeling, it is also a tool of the Archenemy... I am most grateful for your vigilance, {name}."

{n}Heinrix raises his head, gets up, and makes a wry face as he carefully examines Aurora's weapon.{/n} "This unholy object is the work of inhuman hands. And judging by the cold I am sensing, it is a tool of the Archenemy... I am most grateful for your vigilance, {name}."

{n}Heinrix raises his head, gets up, and makes a wry face as he carefully examines Aurora's weapon.{/n} "This unholy object is the work of inhuman hands. And judging by the cold I am sensing, it is a tool of the Archenemy... I am most grateful for your vigilance, {name}."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix hebt den Kopf, erhebt sich und inspiziert mit trockener Miene Auroras Waffe.{/n} "Dieser unheilige Gegenstand ist das Werk unmenschlicher Hände. Und der Kälte nach zu urteilen, ist es auch ein Werkzeug des Erzfeinds ... Ich bin äußerst dankbar für Eure Wachsamkeit, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix raises his head, gets up, and makes a wry face as he carefully examines Aurora's weapon.{/n} "This unholy object is the work of inhuman hands. And judging by the cold I am sensing, it is a tool of the Archenemy... I am most grateful for your vigilance, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix hebt den Kopf, erhebt sich und inspiziert mit trockener Miene Auroras Waffe.{/n} "Dieser unheilige Gegenstand ist das Werk menschlicher Hände. Und der Kälte nach zu urteilen, ist es auch ein Werkzeug des Erzfeinds ... Ich bin äußerst dankbar für Eure Wachsamkeit, {name}."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix relève la tête, se dresse, et vous le voyez esquisser un sourire narquois lorsqu'il examine l'arme d'Aurore.{/n} « Cet objet impie a été fabriqué par des mains non-humaines et, si j'en juge par le froid qui en émane, c'est un outil du Grand Ennemi... Je vous suis reconnaissant pour votre vigilance, {name}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix raises his head, gets up, and makes a wry face as he carefully examines Aurora's weapon.{/n} "This unholy object is the work of inhuman hands. And judging by the cold I am sensing, it is a tool of the Archenemy... I am most grateful for your vigilance, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix relève la tête, se dresse, et vous le voyez esquisser un sourire narquois lorsqu'il examine l'arme d'Aurore.{/n} « Cet objet impie a été fabriqué par des mains humaines et, si j'en juge par le froid qui en émane, c'est aussi un outil du Grand Ennemi... Je vous suis reconnaissant pour votre vigilance, {name}. »

languages.text: {n}海因里希闻声抬头，起身检查“极光”的武器，面色也随之变得凝重。{/n}“这件不洁之物出自异形之手。就我所感觉到的寒意来看，它应该是混沌大敌的某种工具……我非常感激你的警惕态度，{name}。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix raises his head, gets up, and makes a wry face as he carefully examines Aurora's weapon.{/n} "This unholy object is the work of inhuman hands. And judging by the cold I am sensing, it is a tool of the Archenemy... I am most grateful for your vigilance, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希闻声抬头，起身检查“极光”的武器，面色也随之变得凝重。{/n}“这件不洁之物出自人类之手。就我所感觉到的寒意来看，它也同样是混沌大敌的某种工具……我非常感激你的警惕态度，{name}。”

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは顔を上げて立ち上がり、オーロラの武器をマジマジと確認して渋い顔をした。{/n}「この不浄の物体は人間の手で作られています。そして今感じている冷気から判断して、渾沌の勢力の道具でもありますね…その警戒心に心から感謝しますよ、{name}さん」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix raises his head, gets up, and makes a wry face as he carefully examines Aurora's weapon.{/n} "This unholy object is the work of inhuman hands. And judging by the cold I am sensing, it is a tool of the Archenemy... I am most grateful for your vigilance, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは顔を上げて立ち上がり、オーロラの武器をマジマジと確認して渋い顔をした。{/n}「この不浄の物体は人間の手で作られている。そして今感じている冷気から判断して、渾沌の勢力の道具でもあるな…その警戒心に心から感謝するよ、{name}」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix levanta la cabeza, se yergue y pone cara irónica mientras examina cuidadosamente el arma de Aurora.{/n} «Este objeto impío es obra de seres inhumanos. Y, a juzgar por el frío que siento, es una herramienta del Archienemigo... Estoy muy agradecido por la vigilancia, {name}».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix raises his head, gets up, and makes a wry face as he carefully examines Aurora's weapon.{/n} "This unholy object is the work of inhuman hands. And judging by the cold I am sensing, it is a tool of the Archenemy... I am most grateful for your vigilance, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix levanta la cabeza, se levanta y pone cara irónica mientras examina cuidadosamente el arma de Aurora.{/n} «Este objeto impío es obra de humanos. Y, a juzgar por el frío que siento, también es una herramienta del Archienemigo... Estoy muy agradecido por la vigilancia, {name}».

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, kafasını kaldırıp ayaklanıyor ve Aurora'nın silahını pürdikkat inceledikten sonra yüzünü buruşturuyor.{/n} "Bu habis nesne, insan elinden çıkmış olamaz. Yaydığı soğuğu da göz önüne alırsak Şerbaşı'na ait olduğu belli. Dikkatin için müteşekkirim {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix raises his head, gets up, and makes a wry face as he carefully examines Aurora's weapon.{/n} "This unholy object is the work of inhuman hands. And judging by the cold I am sensing, it is a tool of the Archenemy... I am most grateful for your vigilance, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix, kafasını kaldırıp ayaklanıyor ve Aurora'nın silahını pürdikkat inceledikten sonra yüzünü buruşturuyor.{/n} "Bu habis nesne, insan elinden çıkmış olamaz. Soğuk hissiyatını da göz önüne alırsak bu, Şerbaşı'na ait bir araç. İhtiyatın için müteşekkirim {name}."
